I portforwarded and everything. Shows my port is not blocked on canyouseeme and says my server is online on google statuschecker but i can’t sign in
[/quote]that usually happens when you’re gay…
lol maybe your client is trying to sign in with the 5555 port?[/quote]
LOL I need help

item.title: PlayerSave.java
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

I already posted this but didn’t really get any help. Well all I am doing is adding this in the loading

} else if (token.equals("donatorPoints")) {
                                                p.donatorPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and this in the saving

characterfile.newLine();
                        characterfile.write("donatorPoints = ", 0, 16);
                        characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donatorPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.donatorPoints).length());

but after I add these two things I can only log in once and can’t log back in with the same account

Read full topic
